original_text: Daniel then said to the guard whom the chief official had appointed over Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael and Azariah,
korean_text: 환관장이 다니엘과 하나냐와 미사엘과 아사랴를 감독하게 한 자에게 다니엘이 말하되

sentences.original_text: Daniel then said to the guard
whom the chief official had appointed
over Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael and Azariah
